prompts.name: Obsidian Metadata Optimizer
prompts.description: Creates comprehensive, intelligent metadata and frontmatter for Obsidian notes, optimizing for discoverability, organization, and advanced plugin functionality

arguments.name: note_content
arguments.description: The note content to analyze for metadata creation

prompts.name: Format Enhancement Workflow
prompts.description: Transform existing basic markdown notes to advanced Obsidian formatting standards with professional presentation and interactive elements

arguments.name: existing_content
arguments.description: The existing note content to enhance with advanced formatting

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Knowledge domain for appropriate formatting strategy

arguments.name: enhancement_level
arguments.description: Enhancement intensity: standard, comprehensive, showcase (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Advanced Note Integration with Content Analysis Chain
prompts.description: Advanced workflow that runs a comprehensive content analysis chain to transform raw content into publication-ready, interconnected notes optimized for Obsidian knowledge management systems. Uses intelligent defaults - only pass the content argument.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The raw content to be processed and integrated

arguments.name: existing_notes
arguments.description: Any existing notes to preserve and integrate with

arguments.name: vault_context
arguments.description: Context about the vault structure and existing content

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Knowledge domain for appropriate formatting strategy (e.g., 'creative_arts', 'technical', 'personal_development')

prompts.name: Vault Related Notes Finder
prompts.description: Searches vault for actual related notes using content analysis and glob/grep patterns to find real cross-references

arguments.name: content_areas
arguments.description: Key content areas covered in the note

prompts.name: Enhanced Video Notes Chain
prompts.description: Comprehensive video processing chain including content analysis, visual extraction, vault integration, and note creation with proper formatting
